name: Mr.Tobro
description:
Mr.Tobro

BUILD TURRETS. KILL VIRUSES. PROTECT THE CORE. EASY.

Your computer is being hacked by vicious virus ! It's the eeeeeeeeeend...
No ! Because Mr.Tobro antivirus is here to save YOUR system  !
At first, you'll be tight in Mr.Tobro small window. But the more you kill viruses, the greater it becomes !

Gameplay originality

Mr.Tobro is a SHOOTER TOWER DEFENSE where TOWERS DON'T SHOOT AUTOMATICALLY and where YOU RUN OUT OF SPACE quickly.

Jam Commentary

I submitted this to Ludum Dare #42 and the LOWREZJAM.
I had to create a game with the theme "Running out of space" and with  a 64x64 resolution (Yes I'm very clever about that I know). The constraint fits perfectly the theme,  I literally ran out of space making this game. Moreover the main mechanic is about building turrets on the few available spaces you got, the more you build, the more you run out of space... It was my first time time using pico-8, and it was awesome.
